    • Method Detail

      • addBook

        public void addBook()
        Prompts user to enter attributes for a book. Once all attributes have been required, book is added to library system.

      • addCustomer

        public void addCustomer()
        Prompts user to add all necessary attributes. Once attributes are required, customer object is added to library system.

      • borrowBook

        public void borrowBook()
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Prompts user to search for a customer and book to borrow. Once both elements have been attained, book is borrowed.

        java.lang.Exception
